name: Fuel the Fire
description:
In this game you must keep a fire burning by providing it fuel to survive the harsh, cold environment. If the fuel runs out it is game over.

 How to Play

Run around finding items that you can throw into the fire. Pick them up when prompted and take them back to the fire pit to increase it's fuel. Keep going until there is no more fuel.

  •  W A S D/ Arrow Keys = Move character
  •  E = Pickup item (when prompted) and close dialog boxs.

In the top left of the screen is your fuel indicator and the top right shows your current held item

What is this?

A short game created for the Ludum Dare 46 Compo. Made in 27 hours.
The theme was "Keep it alive".

Tools used to create this... game.

  • Unity - Engine
  • Aseprite - Pixel 'Art'
  • Bosca Ceoil - Music
  • Audacity - Sound Effects
